CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y     apt-transport-https     ca-certificates     curl     gnupg     groff-base     build-essential     --no-install-recommends
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -sSL https://dl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add -     && echo "deb [arch=amd64] https://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list
Commands.Name: run
